name: greedily
content:

in a way that shows a wish to have a lot more food, money, etc. than you need: He ate the bread greedily. He smoothed his hair and drank greedily from his water glass. See
greedy
More examplesFewer examplesThey greedily grab your money in good times but are nowhere to be seen when things go wrong.They all stuffed their hands greedily into the bag.Tearing a piece of beef with his fingers, he popped it in his mouth and swallowed greedily.
